General.Name: Shin Hwa Silup
General.Description: Shin Hwa Dynamics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells tin plates in South Korea and internationally. Its electric tin plates steel sheet is used as a material in beverage cans, food cans, paint cans, oil cans, medicine containers, dry battery shells, crowns, etc. The company was formerly known as Shin Hwa Sil Up Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Shin Hwa Dynamics Co., Ltd. in July 2021. Shin Hwa Dynamics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.

1.Name: Hyun-Jun  Kim
1.Title: Managing Director of Trade Department, Team Chief of Export and Inside Director
